markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Deduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=6206) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 178 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Investigator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=231)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Deduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=6204)

</column>

---

You gain one [investigator feat](/Feats.aspx?Traits=318). For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your investigator level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another investigator feat.
name: Advanced Deduction
